item.description:
The holidays always bring out the "kid" in all of us so come out and embrace the spirit of the season!

The Festival of Lights features an enchanted wagon ride that takes you on a journey through an elaborate display of holiday scenes, embellished with millions of lights. Passengers sit back, relax and listen to seasonal favorites as a narrator shares the stories of some of the holiday classics such as The Reindeer Barn with Rudolf and Friends, TheElves' Workshop, Santa's Mailroom, The Elves' Construction Zone, The Eskimo Village, Scrooge's Bank, and many more dazzling displays. Snowmen, Candy Canes, Carolers, and Christmas Bears, adorn the trail and glitter in the night. Giant Nutcrackers, DrummerBoys, Twinkling Toy Soldiers, 30 foot Illuminated Christmas Trees, and many other holiday favorites, sparkle all along this magical, holiday wagon tour.

At the journey's end, the children can enjoy a ride on Santa's Kids Train, The North Pole Express Coaster, and The Magical Merry-Go-Round. You can visit the Petting Zoo and The Gingerbread Coloring House, while you enjoy a holiday treat or sip on a hot cider, coco or coffee. Everyone will enjoy The Holiday Ferris Wheel, where you can catch a bird's eye view of the Festival of Lights and the ski slopes of Nashoba.

- Adults are $13 and children 4-12 are $10. The ticket window opens at 5 pm, the last ticket sold is at 9:30 pm.

- RSVP up to 10 people.

- We are meeting next to the entrance to the Outlook Restaurant at 5:00 pm.

- Looking forward to having you join us!

~Matt
